institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 40 (return and recovery of subsidy)
contents: Article 40 (Return and Recovery of Subsidy) ① The Chairman shall conduct accounting for the business group and, in the following cases, request recovery or return and deposit the amount into the national treasury., 1. Purpose of industry-led training project If the subsidy was used differently from the above, 2. If it is recognized as not related to the industry-led training project, 3. If the expenditure items of regulations and rules are violated, 4. If the subsidy was spent incorrectly due to mistake, etc., 5. The balance of the subsidy, interest. ② If the selection of an industry-led training project is canceled or the project is terminated in accordance with the detailed standards stipulated in Appendix 2, the business group shall depreciate the remaining value and training facilities in accordance with Article 24 (1) of the Operation Regulations. The entire rental deposit for equipment and the remaining balance of support funds for operating expenses, etc. must be returned to the Corporation in cash. ③ The Chairman of the Board may have the amount recognized as unavoidable due to the non-occurrence or unconfirmation of the refunded amount at the time of accounting settlement (retirement benefit reserves, etc.) be recovered or returned by adding up the amount when implementing measures according to the accounting settlement for the following year. there is.
